title: Undo Send
extract: - In the "Undo Send" section, check the box next to "Enable Undo Send." - In the "Send cancellation period" section, set the amount of time you want to decide if you want to unsend an email. - At the bottom of the page, click Save Changes. After you turn on Undo Send, you can cancel sending an email.May 22, 2018
extract_html: - In the "Undo Send" section, check the box next to "Enable Undo Send." - In the "Send cancellation period" section, set the amount of time you want to decide if you want to unsend an email. - At the bottom of the page, click Save Changes. After you turn on Undo Send, you can cancel sending an email.May 22, 2018
